msg: Update a consumer of the ra libraries to use the latest version of the log API,
and save some bandwidth by not sending back the log message contents (since

author: joeswatosh
msg: Make sure the test-svn-server is truly stopped before trying to start it.
trying to start it for the test.

author: joeswatosh
msg: Fix building of Ruby bindings for windows broken in 25740 and 25876.

author: cmpilato
msg: Add a little optimization to the svn_delta_depth_filter_editor().
requested depth is "infinity", don't bother wrapping anything.

author: cmpilato
msg: For sparse directories, and issue #2842 (Add code to client to deal
with unwanted data sent from older servers), add a new editor which
wraps another and performs depth filtering operations.
When plugged into ra_neon, this seems to Do The Right Thing for all
flavors of depth-requesting checkouts.  ra_svn still needs some work.
